Name: Outbreak Story
About the game: Outbreak Story is a SIM game. Players act as a state administrator to obtain points and funds by responding to events in time, and then consume points and funds to make decisions from the four major modules of Hosipital, Government, Emergency and Community. For example, funding vaccine research and development, building new hospitals, closing entertainment venues, social distancing, wearing masks ... The game has a mathematical model to simulate the growth of the number of infected people and respond to the decisions made by players.
